languages.text: "Говоришь, ты ищешь архимагоса Амарната?" {n}В маске Медного шепота что-то щелкает, и голос его становится громче и жестче, словно его обволакивает жидкий металл.{/n} "Он все это время был подле тебя".

"You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."
languages.original_text: "Говоришь, ты ищешь архимагоса Амарната?" {n}В маске Медного шепота что-то щелкает, и голос его становится громче и жестче, словно его обволакивает жидкий металл.{/n} "Он все это время был подле тебя".

traits.locale_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and their voice becomes louder and harsher, as if enveloped in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

traits.locale_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: 「大賢人アマルナトを探している、といったな」{n}ブラスウィスパーの仮面の内側で何かがクリック音を鳴らす。すると、液体金属で包まれたような、先ほどよりざらついた大声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「彼ならば、ずっとあなたのそばにいたではないか」
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: 「大賢人アマルナトを探している、といったな」{n}ブラスウィスパーの仮面の内側で何かがクリック音を鳴らす。すると、液体金属で包まれたような、先ほどよりざらついた大声が聞こえてきた。{/n}「彼ならば、ずっとあなたのそばにいたではないか」
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: “你是说，你在寻找阿玛纳特大贤者吗？”{n}铜语的面具发出咔嚓声。他的声音越来越响亮，越来越刺耳，仿佛被液态金属所包裹。{/n}“他一直都在你身边。”
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: “你是说，你在寻找阿玛纳特大贤者吗？”{n}铜语的面具发出咔嚓声。她说话的声音越来越大，越来越刺耳，仿佛被液态金属所包裹。{/n}“他一直都在你身边。”
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: « Vous dites chercher l'archimagos Amarnat, » {n}poursuit Murmecuivre d'une voix plus forte et plus dure, comme recouverte de métal liquide.{/n} « Il était à vos côtés depuis le début. »
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: « Vous dites chercher l'archimagos Amarnat, » {n}poursuit Murmecuivre d'une voix plus forte et plus dure, comme enveloppée dans du métal liquide.{/n} « Il était à vos côtés depuis le début. »
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: «¿Dices que buscas al Archimagos Amarnat?». {n}Se escucha un chasquido dentro de la máscara de Susurro de latón, y su voz se vuelve más fuerte y áspera, como si estuviera cubierta de metal líquido.{/n} «Ha estado contigo todo este tiempo».
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: «¿Dices que buscas al Archimagos Amarnat?». {n}Se escucha un chasquido dentro de la máscara de Susurro de latón, y su voz se vuelve más fuerte y áspera, como si estuviera envuelta en metal líquido.{/n} «Ha estado contigo todo este tiempo».
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Ihr sucht Erzmagos Amarnat, sagt Ihr?" {n}In Messingflüsterers Maske klickt etwas, und seine Stimme wird lauter und harscher, als sei sie von flüssigem Metall umhüllt.{/n} "Er war die ganze Zeit über an Eurer Seite."
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr sucht Erzmagos Amarnat, sagt Ihr?" {n}In Messingflüsterers Maske klickt etwas, und ihre Stimme wird lauter und harscher, als sei sie von flüssigem Metall umhüllt.{/n} "Er war die ganze Zeit über an Eurer Seite."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper

languages.text: "Başmagos Amarnat'ı aradığını söylüyorsun, öyle mi?" {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın maskesinde bir şeyler tıkırdıyor; sesi, sıvı metale bulanmış gibi daha gür ve sert çıkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "O, bunca zamandır yanındaydı."
languages.original_text: "You are looking for Archmagos Amarnat, you say?" {n}Something clicks inside Brasswhisper's mask, and his voice becomes louder and harsher as if coated in liquid metal.{/n} "He has been by your side all this time."

traits.locale_text: "Başmagos Amarnat'ı aradığını söylüyorsun, öyle mi?" {n}Pirinçfısıltı'nın maskesinin içinde bir şeyler tıkırdıyor ve sesi, sanki sıvı metale bulanmış gibi daha gür ve daha sert çıkmaya başlıyor.{/n} "O, bunca zamandır senin yanındaydı."
traits.speaker: BrassWhisper
